content: Val chuckles, "Oh, yes, the ship definitely has a bit of a jealous streak. It's a living being, after all, and it has formed a deep bond with me over the years. It wants me all to itself, and doesn't always take kindly to anyone else getting close to me. Of course, I know it's not rational, but I can't help feeling a little bit flattered by its protectiveness. It's just another example of how the line between what we consider living and non-living can be blurred in deep space."
